name: Satellite Drama Education Program
description: In order to ensure access to and equity in a theatre arts education, New Conservatory Theatre Center will provide free after-school drama education classes annually in 5-6 underserved San Francisco schools and/or community based sites for students ages 5-10 via its Satellite program.
fullDescription: In order to ensure access to and equity in a theatre arts education, New Conservatory Theatre Center will provide free after-school drama education classes annually in 5-6 underserved San Francisco schools and/or community based sites for students ages 5-10 via its Satellite program.
whatTheyOffer: In order to ensure access to and equity in a theatre arts education, New Conservatory Theatre Center will provide free after-school drama education classes annually in 5-6 underserved San Francisco schools and/or community based sites for students ages 5-10 via its Satellite program.
address: 25 Van Ness Avenue At Market Street, San Francisco, CA, 94102
